alert.note: Alert for Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 21 at 6:20PM CDT until April 21 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southern Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 620 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Deer Park, or 15 miles south of Vidalia, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sibley around 655 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
